meanings.sent1: She received the decuman prize for coming in tenth place.

meanings.sent3: The decuman squirrel in the race was slow but steady.

meanings.sent1: The farmer donated a decuman of his harvest to the church.
meanings.sent2: The decuman of her income went towards charity every month.
